metadata.synopsis: Fallback case - Tusgront tries to stop you leaving the Alleyway, but you're somehow unable to initiate dialog with him, this is just an AD for the same line he has about not letting you leave - but in AD form incase players are muted or such as they leave.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Bully your way into the alleyway (but not the guildhall) with Tusgront- Leave the area, but be muted or silenced or such

0.speaker: Tusgront
0.text: Said you could pass without paying. Didn't say you could leave!
0.context: NodeContext: With a smile - about to have some fun
